question: When were the Sassi of Matera recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site?
asked_question_translated: Kdaj so bili Sassi v Materi priznani kot Unescova svetovna dediščina?
answer: Sassi v Materi so bili priznani kot Unescova svetovna dediščina leta 1993.
answer_translated_eng: The Sassi in Matera were recognised as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1993.
